text: Boško Baškot (Serbian Cyrillic: Бошко Башкот; 11 June 1922 – 19 March 2013) was a notable Yugoslav Partisan and Bosnian politician, Minister of the Interior of SR Bosnia and Herzegovina and sports administrator. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2013 deaths Category:People from Prijedor Category:Serbs of Bosnia and Herzegovina Category:Yugoslav politicians Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina politicians Category:FK Sarajevo presidents of the assembly
title: Boško Baškot
